name: Ram
summary: Ram believes in fundamental innovation to help users at scale, and at an affordable price point. He has 16+ years of experience in building software products and 6 years of running a business. He has 3 patents in Natural language processing and mobile tech.

name: Sona
summary: Sona is a designer turned entrepreneur. Over the last 10+ years, Sona has designed for multiple startups and MNCs in diverse sectors. She is an author of a popular design portal. Apart from digital products, she also designs educational games for kids.

name: Sisir
summary: Sisir is a technical lead with extensive experience in backend and cloud technologies. An excellent programmer and an expert at software lifecycle management, Sisir is a rare breed who can be counted on to deliver the best results.

name: Dhruv
summary: Dhruv is an experienced data scientist with experience in building a data science pipeline. He has expertise in interpreting data, performing analytics and visualization, and designing algorithms and models. An expert in Computer Vision and Image Processing problems.

name: Rahul
summary: Rahul is a front-end web & mobile developer with strong experience in UI frameworks and Javascript. He cares about every pixel on the screen. He has a knack for making user experiences flawless and enjoyable.

name: Vicky
summary: Vicky is a systems engineer with expertise in crafting mathematical models and vector frameworks. He has strong fundamentals in algorithms, data structures, and computer systems. One of our rising stars at HelloSivi.
